General.Name: Ample Electronic Technology Co Ltd
General.Description: Ample Electronic Technology Co.,Ltd. engages in the research, development, design, manufacturing, and sale of thick-film conductive materials in Taiwan. It offers high-temperature termination and inner silver conductive pastes; copper pastes; low temperature termination silver epoxy pastes; and silver rear paste for photovoltaic cell. The company was founded in 2007 and is based in Kaohsiung, Taiwan.
